text.p: Hua Tong Hai - 55,000 tonnes hss Mississippi/Egyptian Med $12.50 10,000/5,000 19-26/5 Cargill (adds vessel name).
Montreux - 52,000 tonnes hss Amazon/Lisbon-Hamburg range $15.50 fio 5,000/10,000 19-29/5 Andre (reported).
TBN - 50,000 tonnes grain up river Plate and Rio Grande/two ports China $29.50 fio 5,000/2,500 ppt Nidera.
Velos - 50,000 tonnes barley Antwerp/Iran $21.50 fio 8,000/5,000 ppt Continental.
Athinais P - 19,400 tonnes sbm Paranagua/Spain lumpsum equivalent to $18 fio eight days 20-22/5 Transcatalana.
TBN - 15,000 tonnes wheat Caen/Cuba $20 fio 4,000/1,000 ppt Glencore.
